# TagAny.TiffEpStandardId field

Contains four ASCII characters representing the TIFF/EP standard version of a TIFF/EP file, eg '1', '0', '0', '0'

```csharp
public static readonly Tag TiffEpStandardId;
```

## Remarks

Expected type is Byte.
